name: Scary Cutter
description:
Thanks for playing Scary Cutter! This game was created by Christian Schicho for the first Novice Now! Game Jam After many tries i ended up with this idea. It took me about 3 weeks to complete. I want to thank everybody who motivated me#to finish this game!

How does the game work:

Your family sent you to collect wood for the fireplace. The problem is that the woods are protected by the wood skeleton.Try to avoid him or you loose everything and your family will be sad.
